abilities.name: Roar of the Sword
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Storm Slash
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Psychic Energy attached to this Pokémon.
